name: Dreamscape (itch) (Splatter Pattern Studio)
description:
Transform into different animals each with their own unique abilities to overcome obstacles and escape a giant eldritch nightmare. Explore this dreamscape through the eyes of a young child and discover the truth of what lies behind this innocent world. 

Music by Rolemusic: https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Rolemusic

**All music used in this project is licensed under Creative Commons and Public Domain**
